item.description:
Join other business professionals and successful entrepreneurs for a little mingling and socializing. Make sure to think up a creative name for your name tag! At last month's event we had a "mob lawyer" a "government informant" an "envelope stuffer" and a "jewel thief." The tags will provide a fun ice breaker for everyone as well and generate a few chuckles along the way.

This laid back but upscale mixer is perfect for making new business contacts and pitching your service or product. New in town? Looking to meet new people? This is also a great opportunity to get out and do a little social networking!

THINGS TO KNOW:
*Check in staff will be located at tables to the left as you enter
*Bring business cards!
*This event is open to all!
*Average age range of attendees varies. The majority of guests are between the ages of 24-44.
*Dress code is trendy business casual.
*Expect to meet people from all fields - Medical, Legal, Creative, Fashion, Entrepreneurs, Event Planning, Finance
*Ethnically diverse crowd of professionals
*Most people arrive by 7:30pm
*Event should last until 9:30
*Food will be served until 7:30pm


$5 Admission - PrePay Requested: CORRECT LINK TO PAY IS:
http://bostonmoxieint...

$10 if you pay at the door.

group.name: The Boston Social/Singles Networking Meetup Group

item.name: Networking Happy Hour for Professionals
